location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain G Walker, Commanding HCC (the Honourable Company's Cruiser) Elphinstoneand Senior Marine Officer in the Gulf, Persia

mods.abstract: The letter is written from HCC (the Honourable Company's Cruiser) Amherst, Muscat Cove.Informing him that the Antelopewas not required in the Gulf and could proceed to Bombay without touching at Bushere [Bushire].
